data.message:
Been a fan for years, and I gotta say I wasn't surprised when you attacked Trump in your campaign speech track (and now attacking him even more by wearing that shirt and calling him out at your concert), considering how much you attacked Bush in the past. But remember this? You clearly had no problem having him speak at an event for you in the past before he entered politics. 

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=2NBwt24PTe0
